column2: "Hey, <%me>. Have you come here to investigate, too?"
"As long as you're here, you want to tag along with us?"
"1. Go with Zeno and Echo."
"2. Investigate alone."
"That's the spirit! Plus, I'll be at ease with you here."
"Ahem! Aren't you forgetting someone?"
"Right, you're here, too, Echo."
"Don't you think you've been ignoring me a bit too much, lately?"
"It's because you need to learn to stand up for yourself!"
"You don't find it old, clinging to me all the time?"
"But... that's not..."
"Sorry, did you say something?"
"Who do you think you're talking to? Come on, <%me>. Let's leave Zeno here."
"She seems down, but if she's still feeling good enough to get that angry, then she's probably fine..."
"By the way, <%me>, be on your guard. I've got a bad feeling about this place."
"I understand. Contact me if anything comes up."
"Later, <%me>!"
"Ruin"
"惑星ナベリウス\u3000遺跡"
